response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, it's worth $15,000 to us. However, I understand the importance of finding the right price point that benefits both parties. Therefore, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product for $14,000. This represents an excellent opportunity to secure a high-quality asset at a discounted rate. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies both our interests.", "product_price": 14000}
